subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann, the coach of the United States national team, named a 22-man roster for two coming friendly matches — against Honduras on Oct. 8 in Miami Gardens, Fla., and Ecuador on Oct. 11 in Harrison, N.J.
snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann, the coach of the United States national team, named a 22-man roster for two coming friendly matches — against Honduras on Oct. 8 in Miami Gardens, Fla., and Ecuador on Oct. 11 in Harrison, N.J.
